revised_title: Investigating the Electrical Conductivity and Luminosity of Flames Containing Vaporized Salts
tldr: The authors investigate the electrical conductivity and luminosity of flames containing vaporized salts, focusing on the relationship between conductivity and concentration. They find that the conducting power of salt vapors increases with increasing concentration and temperature, and that the molecular conductivity of salts varies depending on the type of salt and its concentration.
